title: Bug 6322 - All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322 - All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) etc.
OB: The obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) are prominently visible in the Open Type dialog.
EB: The obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) should not be displayed in the Open Type dialog.
SR:
To resolve this issue, there are two suggested options:

a) Sort the lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter in the Open Type dialog.

b) Completely filter out the obfuscated classes from the Open Type dialog.

I suggest implementing option a).
